import * as React from 'react'; import PageLayout from '../components/molecules/PageLayout'; import DeskFrame1 from '../components/molecules/DeskFrame1'; import { Box } from '../components/atoms/grid'; import { List, Item, P, H1, H2, H3, H4 } from '../components/atoms/text'; import { Flex, Box, Text, Image, Link, Heading } from 'rebass'; import bg from '../static/images/bg-1.png'; const About: React.FC<{}> = () => { return ( About Us Who We Are Alkenox Media & Entertainment is an independent branding and content creation company with a focus on the digital experience. We create tailored, edgy, and untraditionally entertaining content for  the promotion of your brand and it's products or services. The main goal of content is to inform or educate, to entertain, to give some form of emotional satisfaction, or to become socially valuable (ie. clickable, relatable, and shareable). Meeting these requirements keeps your audience’s attention and motivates their interaction with your brand. By connecting your brand with your audience through added entertainment value, you give them a branded memory they will want to keep. This incites a stronger response, and desire, to interact with your brand. Our Mission Alkenox Media & Entertainment's mission is to help small companies grow their client base by creating a shareable company image and digital content that is out of the box, motivates brand interaction, and connects with their audience on an emotional/relateable level. Core Values
  • Commitment to our clients
  • Quality in everything we do
  • Keep learning, growing and evolving
  • Be professional, but be real
  • Share and Listen to all ideas
  • Experimentation is encouraged
  • We are all responsible
  • Work as a team
  • Have fun doing what you love
  • Trust is everything
  • Treat everyone with respect
 ); }; export default About;
